title: The anatomy of the English nunnery at Lisbon in Portugall Dissected and laid open by one that was sometime a yonger brother of the conuent: who (if the grace of God had not preuented him) might haue growne as old in a wicked life as the oldest among them. Published by authoritie.
author: Robinson, Thomas, fl. 1622.
publisher: Printed by George Purslowe, for Robert Mylbourne, and Philemon Stephens: and are to be sold at the great south doore of Pauls,
